name: Paint.ly 3D: Pottery Art Color
description:
Easy to play: Select your 3D Object, Pick a Line-art & Color it By Number!

Exclusive AR MULTIPLAYER Mode - COLOR WITH YOUR FRIENDS!



Paint.ly 3D is the first realistic 3D coloring game with selections of different line-art templates. With perfect 3D models and fascinating line-art, you will experience something totally refreshing.

Innovative Function: Multiplayer AR Mode - Invite your friend to Color Together!


Our Key Features:

1.Various 3D Objects

2.Meticulous Line-art Templates

3.Clear UI & Smooth Gameplay

4.Exclusive AR function

5.Multiplayer AR Mode

6.Share on Social Media

7.Record your Process
